title: Video Editor for Viral Youtube channel
job_overview:
We’re looking for a talented YouTube video editor who can help bring gripping, suspenseful stories to life — just like the content on our channel: Shock Files.

About the Channel:
Shock Files focuses on short, fast-paced, highly engaging videos centered around shocking real-life stories, mysteries, true crime, and dark internet lore. Our style is punchy, dramatic, and visually immersive. Think: high retention, YouTube-optimized editing with gripping pacing.

What We’re Looking For:
???? Someone who can edit videos in a style similar to Shock Files (check our latest uploads for reference).
???? Strong storytelling instincts — knowing how to build suspense and keep viewers engaged.
???? Comfortable working with voiceovers, stock footage, sound design, and text-based elements.
? Fast turnaround time (3–5 days per video).
????? You use Adobe Premiere, Final Cut, DaVinci Resolve — or any software that gets the job done at a high level.

Ideal Candidate:

Proven experience editing content for YouTube (preferably in the mystery, horror, or true crime space).

Knows how to work with pacing, audio, and visuals to maximize retention.

Can source and integrate relevant b-roll and dramatic effects.

Detail-oriented and reliable — meets deadlines and follows creative direction.

What You’ll Get:
? Consistent work (2–4 videos per month to start, with potential for more)
? Competitive pay per video (negotiable based on experience)
? Creative freedom within a proven format
? Long-term collaboration potential

To Apply:
Please send:

A short message about your experience

Links to your best relevant work (true crime / storytelling videos are a big plus)

Your typical rate per video (5–10 minutes in length)

Let’s create something captivating together.
Looking forward to hearing from you!
